title: Football in Wallis and Futuna
text: The <a href="sport">sport</a> of <a href="Association%20football">football</a> in the <a href="overseas%20collectivity">overseas collectivity</a> of <a href="Wallis%20and%20Futuna">Wallis and Futuna</a> is governed by the <a href="Wallis%20and%20Futuna%20Soccer%20Federation">Fédération de Ligue de Football de Wallis et Futuna.</a> The association administers the <a href="Wallis%20and%20Futuna%20national%20football%20team">Wallis and Futuna national football team</a> as well as the <a href="Wallis%20Premi%C3%A8re%20Division">Wallis Première Division</a> and the <a href="Futuna%20Premi%C3%A8re%20Division">Futuna Première Division</a>.
